articles.title: Indiana man pardoned by Trump is fatally shot by officer during traffic stop - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: Matthew Huttle, 42, of Hobart was killed Sunday by a Jasper County sheriff's deputy, authorities said.
articles.content: RENSSELAER, Ind. (AP) An Indiana man was fatally shot by a deputy during a traffic stop just days after he was pardoned by President Donald Trump for a misdemeanor related to the 2021 U.S. Capitol ri… [+1553 chars]
